name: Guiding Wind
achievementgroup: Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song

stage1.title: Guiding Wind
stage1.description: Follow 10 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

stage2.title: Guiding Wind
stage2.description: Follow 20 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

stage3.title: Guiding Wind
stage3.description: Follow 40 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).
